constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 108 (Friday, June 24, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CAWTHORN:
H.R. 8225.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1. Section 8
[Page H5919]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the treatment of anesthesiologist assistants in the Veterans Health Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
